item.title: Sentiment analysis on IMDB dataset
item.description: Introduction This is as exemple from the excellent book by François Chollet on deep learning. My idea here is to further detail the explanation with the code output, which the book does not contain. And since tensorflow 2.0 was released, I will be using tf.keras instead. The goal of this example is The steps are Load data Load imdb data from keras datasets.

item.title: First Article
item.description: Introduction Meta post about how I do it. Images from URL You can just insert the link for inline images. This does not seem to work in a standaline paragraph. https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51283k0NwXL._SL200_.jpg In order to override the theme css for images display I manually inserted the html with a different style="display: revert;". Graphs from interactive code blocks Using emacs-jupyter together with org-mode babel.
